text: Bob Lake is a Republican former member of the Montana Legislature. He was elected for Senate District 44, representing the Hamilton, Montana area, in 2010. He previously served in the House of Representatives from 2003-2011. In 2012 he was elected to the Montana Public Service Commission, representing District 4. ==References== ==External links== * Home page Category:Living people Category:1938 births Category:Montana Republicans Category:Montana state senators Category:People from Ronan, Montana Category:Members of the Montana House of Representatives Category:People from Hamilton, Montana
title: Bob Lake
